personal_statement_what_to_improve: There was no demonstration of James' desire to work with young people or improve their lives.  There was little evidence of understanding of the role of a teacher, the skills he has which translate well into teaching or what life in the classroom looks like.  While James has some experience working with new recruits, there was no acknowledgement of the difference between secondary school students (some of whom will not have any interest in History) and recruits who have elected to join the Army.
subject_knowledge_what_to_improve: Your passion for military history was evident but this will make up only a small part of the National Curriculum.  How might you engage students when covering other aspects of the NC?
